text: Arrā ga kare ni ōken o sadzuke rareta koto kara,(kōman ni natte) omoni tsuite iburāhīmu to rongi shita mono o, anata wa shiranakatta no ka. Iburāhīmu ga,`watashi no omo wa,-sei o sazuke mata shi o tamau katada.' To itta toki, kare wa `watashi mo,-sei o sazuke mata shi o ataeru.' To itta. Iburāhīmu wa itta. `Arrā wa, taiyō o azuma kara nobora se rareru. Sorede anata wa, sore o nishi kara nobora se nasai.' Sokode kano fushin-sha wa tōwaku shite shimatta. Arrā wa fugi o okonau min o onmichibiki ni nara renai
